heading: what does it do?
subheading: you're happily tooling along one day and next thing you know, you're a victim of foul play. should you find yourself locked into a tight situation, you'll be glad you've got one of these within arm's reach. wait for the right moment, grab it, and go. what is it, anyway? and what does it do? […]
author: wired staff
text: you're happily tooling along one day and next thing you know, you're a victim of foul play. should you find yourself locked into a tight situation, you'll be glad you've got one of these within arm's reach. wait for the right moment, grab it, and go.what is it, anyway? and what does it do?the wired contestthe rules: for a chance to get out and enjoy the open road on a harley-davidson sportster, identify the item pictured at right (by manufacturer or designer) and its function. correct entries will be placed in a random grand prize competition, with one winner drawn early next year awarded a harley-davidson xl 1200s sportster. for contest rules, prize information, and the answer to september's "what does it do?", click here.__ win a harley-davidson xl 1200s sportster __
